gameQuestions.explanation: Friction opposes the direction of sliding.
More mass means more inertia (resistance to change).
Balanced forces mean no change in motion.
Gravity attracts towards the mass center.

gameQuestions.q: Sliding on ice is easier because...
gameQuestions.explanation: Ice has a low coefficient of friction.

gameQuestions.q: To stop a moving car, you need...
gameQuestions.explanation: A braking force is required to decelerate.

gameQuestions.q: In a series circuit, if one bulb breaks...
gameQuestions.explanation: The path is broken, so current stops.

gameQuestions.q: In a parallel circuit, voltage is...
gameQuestions.explanation: Components in parallel share the same voltage.

gameQuestions.q: What provides the push for electrons?

gameQuestions.explanation: More resistance opposes flow, reducing current.
Electrons are negative and seek the positive terminal.
Current bypasses load via a low resistance path, dangerous.
